entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasley family is mentioned as the ones who gave something to someone.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a member of the Weasley family and is upset about the behavior of his sons.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the Weasley brothers who gave something to someone.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is another Weasley brother who defended himself against Mr. Weasley's accusations.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a friend of the Weasleys and agrees with George that someone is a great bullying git.

entities.name: muggle
entities.description: Muggles are non-magical people who are being mistreated by wizards.

entities.name: wizard
entities.description: Wizards are magical people who are campaigning against the mistreatment of Muggles.

entities.name: bully
entities.description: Someone is described as a great bullying git.

entities.name: tongue
entities.description: The tongue of someone is mentioned as being four feet long.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley is a member of the Weasley family.
George describes someone as a great bullying git.
Harry agrees with George that someone is a great bullying git.
Mr. Weasley is campaigning against the mistreatment of Muggles.
George has a tongue that was four feet long before it was shrunk.
Mr. Weasley is angry with his sons for their behavior.
